name: Mazes-ing
description:
Navigate 3d cubes and cylinder, jump, and try to get to the exit. Handcrafted levels for increasing chalenge.

When you start the game you have choice between "Flat" which are classical 2d mazes, and "3d" which are ... (no I let you guess)

There are 120 levels for now. I handcrafted most of them. If you guys like it I'll make more.

Controls

On desktop you'll play using the direction keys of your keyboard to move the ball and find the exit.

Mouse left click and drag can be used to rotate the maze and look behind. You'll need that to plan your path.

Feedback please

Ok so that's my first game. Let me know what you think. 

Have good fun!
